title: Login issue
description: User unable to log into the system with correct credentials.

title: Payment not processed
description: Customer reports payment deducted but not reflected in system.

title: Bug in dashboard
description: Dashboard widgets not loading correctly on Chrome.

title: Feature request: Dark mode
description: Customer requested a dark mode for better usability at night.

title: Error 500 on checkout
description: Server error occurring during checkout process.

title: Mobile app crash
description: App crashes on launch for Android 12 users.

title: Invoice not received
description: Customer did not receive invoice email after purchase.

title: Password reset not working
description: Password reset link leads to error page.

title: Notification delay
description: Push notifications delayed by up to 10 minutes.

title: Database timeout
description: Frequent database timeouts during high traffic.

title: Integration error
description: Third-party API returning invalid response codes.

title: Performance lag
description: System performance degraded during reports generation.

title: Email not delivered
description: Transactional emails not reaching Gmail accounts.

title: Two-factor auth problem
description: Customer unable to receive 2FA SMS codes.
